message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it directly from me at the same value, $10,000. This direct sale ensures you receive the best possible service and support throughout your journey with our product. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
